title: Lakshmi Devi Stud Earrings - Divine Grace in Every Detail
materials: Emerald. Gold is meticulously crafted using traditional Nakshi techniques with a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: These exquisite stud earrings feature a finely detailed Lakshmi Devi motif at the center, crafted with traditional Nakshi work. The outer frame is adorned with sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones in a delicate floral pattern, accented with vibrant Ruby and Emerald cabochons. A lustrous cultured pearl dangles gracefully from the bottom, completing the divine look. The earring has a sturdy, comfortable stud backing for secure wear.
occasions: Perfect for traditional occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
and family gatherings. Can also be worn to add a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits for parties or special events.
description: These earrings are a stunning blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The Lakshmi Devi motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making them an auspicious and meaningful gift. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability. The unique design will make you stand out with grace and sophistication.
